Package cpg.mvc.crossword.view

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AddKeywordDialogController
    This class opens a new dialog window to add a new keyword to the wordList inside the wordListController.
    CrosswordGridMakery
    This class provides methods to make a crossword as GridPane from a two dimensional string array.
    CrosswordPuzzleController
    This class takes a word dictionary with keywords (words to be guessed) and clues (hints for a specific word) and gives it to the crosswordGenerator to generate a 2 dimensional crossword array as crossword puzzle.
    CrosswordPuzzleMenuBarController
    This is the controller class for the CrosswordPuzzleMenuBar.fxml that provides the menu bar inside the CrosswordPuzzleView.
    CrosswordPuzzleView
    Shows the crossword puzzle as GridPane in a new window.
    EditCluesDialogController
    This class opens a dialog window, that enables to edit the clues for a specific keyword in a text area.
    FillUpDialogController
    This class opens a dialog window, that enables to set the number of words to fill up an existing crossword puzzle.
    GenerateDialogController
    This class is the controller for a small dialog window called by the rootLayoutClass to receive the parameters for the crossword construction that are the number of rows (widths) and number of columns (height) for the crossword to be generated.
    RootLayoutController
    This is the controller class for the root layout that provides the menu bar inside the primaryStage.
    WordListController
    This is the controller class for the WordListView.fxml.
